data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_0
data.text:
AT LAST THE DOOR SWUNG OPEN TO
                REVEAL A CADAVEROUS OLD MAN WHO
                PEERED OUT INTO THE DARKNESS AT ME...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_1
data.text: WHO ARE YOU? WHAT DO YOU WNAT?

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_2
data.text: I WANT TO SEE PROFESSOR BLUTRESS. THE AGENCY SENT ME.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_3
data.text: OH, YES. YOU MUST BE THE SECRETARY I SENT FOR. I'M PROFESSOR BLUTRESS-- COME IN. COME IN.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_4
data.text: AS WE ENTERED THE PRO- FESSOR'S STUDY AN UNEARTHLY SCREAM CAME FROM THE DARK RECESSES OF THE HOUSE...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_5
data.text: GOOD LORD! WHAT WAS THAT? IT SOUNDED LIKE A SCREAM!

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_6
data.text: A SCREAM? I HEARD NOTHING, MR. HOWE.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_7
data.text: I COULD HAVE SWORN-- PERHAPS IT WAS JUST MY IMAGINATION.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_8
data.text: YOU ARE TIRED. LET ME TAKE YOU TO YOUR ROOM. WE'LL DISCUSS YOUR DUTIES IN THE MORNING... COME...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_9
data.text:
THE NEXT MORNING I AWOKE EARLY
                AND STARTED DOWNSTAIRS. ON THE WAY DOWN I
                PASSED A HEAVY BARRED DOOR...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_10
data.text: THAT'S STRANGE! I WONDER WHAT'S BEHIND IT? IT'S THICK ENOUGH TO BE A VAULT.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_012_11
data.text: SUDDENLY I BECAME AWARE OF A FRIGHTFUL ODOR THAT SEEMED TO COME FROM BEHIND THE DOOR. THE NAUSEATING STENCH OF DECAYED, ROTTING FLESH...
